description.@en: Love it or hate it, you are a professional hireling. This rough- and-tumble life has taught you a few important lessons before you joined an ‘adventuring party’.

effect.@en: Add 3 to your Encumbrance Limit. In addition, whenever you negotiate your rate of pay, add your [FB] in the type of coins you will be paid in. For instance, if you are being paid as a Stevedore (2bp daily) and have a [FB] of 4, you would be paid 6bp a day instead.
